summaryOfNewsArticle: The article explores the growing influence of Artificial Intelligence in education, highlighting both the transformative potential and the challenges it presents. It underscores the importance of government policies in ensuring that AI is developed and deployed in a way that is equitable, transparent, and beneficial to all students. The article calls for the establishment of ethical guidelines to prevent bias and ensure privacy in AI-driven educational tools.
title: AI in Education: Balancing Innovation with Responsibility
